title: A Benchmark Dataset for Satellite-Based Estimation and Detection of Rain
summary: This paper introduces a standardized benchmark dataset for satellite-based precipitation retrieval, addressing the need for fair comparisons and algorithm development in tracking the global distribution and evolution of precipitation.
usefulness_reason: The title mentions "Benchmark Dataset" and the summary discusses "global distribution and evolution of precipitation" and "satellite observations", which implies spatio-temporal data. This is relevant to "Spatio Temporal" and "Contextual dataset".
